thread.title: Priyanka Chopra to return to India next week for 'Bajirao Mastani'
thread.title_full: Priyanka Chopra to return to India next week for 'Bajirao Mastani' - Entertainment

author: PTI
title: Priyanka Chopra to return to India next week for 'Bajirao Mastani'
text:
Bollywood actress Priyanka Chopra, who is busy filming her maiden American TV series "Quantico" in Los Angeles, will return to the country next week to shoot filmmaker Sanjay Leela Bhansali's "Bajirao Mastani".
The 33-year-old actress has received almost positive reviews from TV critics and fans for her role of a young FBI recruit Alex Parrish in the new ABC show, which debuted on Sunday in the US.

Priyanka Chopra 
Besides "Quantico", Priyanka has also been busy shooting Bhansali's magnum opus, which is scheduled to release on December 18, and has been shuttling between India and US.
"Ep2 #Quantico starts Tom! Phew.. Breakneck speed! Back to #BajiraoMastani next week..Gotta finish episode..learn lines.. sleep.. Gn world. Zzzz," Priyanka posted on twitter.
"Bajirao Mastani" is a story about noted general Maratha Peshwa Baji Rao I (Ranveer Singh), his second wife Mastani (Deepika Padukone) and first wife Kashi (Priyanka).
